backend/main.mo: Defines actor state, data models, and maps for glossary, articles, research papers, blogs, market data, and user profiles with authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries detailing modified frontend files, related components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation explaining staged deployment, verification, and troubleshooting steps for retrying app deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring fonts, metadata, favicons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Overview of deployment helper scripts including the retry build-and-deploy script.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-and-deploy-: Bash script automating frontend build, backend build, and deployment with timestamped logs and stage output.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s routing, theme, query client, and maintenance-mode gate, rendering header, footer, pages, and the chat widget.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the brand logo with error handling and a text fallback when the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Cash: Displays a cash‑flow table with optional running balance and CSV export, with empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Resu: Empty placeholder file for a bar chart component.
Renders a donut‑style SVG pie chart showing invested vs earned amounts with fallback empty state.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Implements a floating chat assistant with intent detection, message handling, backend calls, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/domain/CustomDom: Empty placeholder file for custom‑domain FAQ content.
Empty placeholder file for custom‑domain guide content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a footer with a live or closing NIFTY 50 stock ticker, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBackupRe: Provides UI and logic to export, import, validate, and restore glossary snapshots with merge or replace options.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBulkImpo: Offers a panel to publish a predefined batch of C‑terms to the glossary with confirmation and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component handling navigation, theme switching, user auth via Internet Identity, and mobile menu interactions.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Full‑screen maintenance page showing a logo, icon, status message, and footer.
frontend/src/data/glossaryBulkImportC.ts: Static glossary batch defining C‑terms and definitions for bulk import into the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, providing login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for maintenance status, admin checks, user profiles, chat, and glossary operations using an actor-based backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and defines light and dark theme design tokens using custom CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and philosophy information using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays categorized financial articles with tabs and fetches article data per category via React Query.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Implements an APY calculator that computes required contributions based on age and desired pension using a preset matrix.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single blog post with metadata, tags, content, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Displays a list of blogs with loading and error states, showing blog cards with dates, titles, excerpts, and tags that navigate to detailed pages.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Provides a form-based calculator for computing CAGR using initial value, final value, and time period inputs, with live result display.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Shows categorized lists of financial calculators, each linking to a dedicated tool with icons, descriptions, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form integrated with feedback submission along with email and social contact cards, handling submission and form state.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Displays legal disclaimers, investment risk warnings, and notes clarifying that the site provides educational content, not financial advice.
frontend/src/pages/DomainNamePage.tsx: Empty page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: A React page that calculates EMI, total interest, and total repayment based on loan amount, rate, and tenure with input form UI.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: A React page for computing EPF contributions and maturity using salary, contribution rates, interest, and tenure with summarized results.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: A React page that calculates FD maturity and interest using simple or compound interest with user‑entered principal, rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, and sorting feedback with authentication and storage usage info.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: A calculator page comparing fixed-rate and reducing-balance loan interest and repayment totals.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: Provides a searchable glossary with grouping, sorting, admin diagnostics, and reference linking. Fetches terms from backend hooks and displays grouped results with admin tools for validation and backup.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: Calculates employee gratuity based on last drawn salary and years of service using the standard formula. Renders inputs, eligibility logic, and formatted gratuity output.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: Implements a GST calculator with inputs for amount and GST rate, computing CGST, SGST, total tax, and final amount. Includes UI for navigation, data entry, and formatted tax breakdown.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: Implements a home loan EMI calculator computing EMI, total interest, and total repayment from loan amount, interest rate, and tenure. Provides input fields and displays calculated financial breakdown.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage layout with hero, features, and navigation buttons linking to learning, glossary, and research sections.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: Computes HRA exemption using salary components, rent, and city type, returning exempt and taxable HRA. Includes UI for salary inputs and displays calculated results.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Displays structured learning sections, handles topic-based filtering, auto-scrolling, and shows matched or unmatched topic alerts.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Implements a lump sum investment calculator using compound interest and displays results, inputs, and a simple cash flow breakdown.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates NPS corpus, annuity amount, and monthly pension based on user inputs and renders related UI.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: Computes NSC maturity value and interest using compound interest and provides input fields with formatted result display.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a PPF calculator with yearly investment, tenure, and interest inputs and computes maturity, interest, and total invested.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: Implements an RD calculator using monthly deposits, interest rate, and tenure to compute maturity value and interest earned.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: Displays SEBI/RBI guidelines, fraud awareness info, and investor protection details using tabs and informational cards.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: Fetches and displays research papers with loading states and supports PDF downloads.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: Implements a simple interest calculator with inputs for principal, rate, and time, showing computed interest and total amount.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: Calculates and compares simple and compound interest using user inputs for principal, rate, time, and compounding frequency.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates SIP future value from monthly contributions, rate, and duration and shows results with charts and cash flow schedule.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: Runs SSY maturity calculations based on yearly investment, child's age, and fixed interest rate, outputting maturity value and deposit years.
Offers step-up SIP calculations by amount or percentage, computing total value, invested amount, and returns over time.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a UI and logic to calculate systematic withdrawal plan results based on investment, withdrawal amount, return rate, and duration.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: Allows entry of multiple dated cash flows and computes XIRR using a Newton-Raphson approximation method.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Provides language, intent, and calculator detection plus refusal message builders for the ArthSaathi chat assistant.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Generates asset URLs using Vite's base path and exports static asset paths and brand metadata.
frontend/src/utils/cashFlowSchedules.ts: Utilities for generating labels, cash‑flow schedules, and running balances used in calculators.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Implements CSV escaping, CSV string generation, and client-side CSV download.
frontend/src/utils/feedbackForm.ts: Stores the Google feedback form URL and provides helpers to open or embed it.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Number formatting utilities including INR currency, Indian numbering, percentages, and byte sizes.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parses glossary definitions, extracts references, normalizes terms, groups terms, and resolves cross-references.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryKey.ts: Normalizes glossary terms into deterministic keys and exposes a helper to convert terms to backend keys.
frontend/src/utils/learningTopics.ts: Defines learning topics and provides lookup utilities by slug or section title.
frontend/src/utils/navStructure.ts: Defines the grouped navigation structure used across the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color variables, container settings, animations, and plugin imports.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing feature requests and state for embedding a Google Form in the Contact page’s Feedback section.
